name: notificationhub
0:
”Alexa, open notification hub.”
”what are we going to test.”
”what is postman.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: notification hub
des:
A skill to guide about steps and tools used in testing. The skill is designed to support your journey to start testing alexa notifications. It includes tips, resources ,guidelines, do's and dont's which should be followed throughout the process of testing at different stages.
As you start with this process you will have questions about how to start, what all tools we should use , what stage to test notifications in and many more questions like this. Simply enable the notification hub skill and ask alexa for "alexa, open notification hub" and then you can be specific and ask "alexa, what are we going to test" , "alexa, where to test". It will help you with the latest updates regarding all queries for notification testing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
